Package org.maxicp.modeling.constraints.helpers

Interface ConstraintFromRecord

All Superinterfaces:
CacheScope, Constraint
All Known Implementing Classes:
AllDifferent, Alternative, AlwaysIn, BinPacking, CardinalityMax, CardinalityMin, Circuit, Cumulative, Disjunctive, Exclude, ExpressionIsTrue, Insert, Length, LessOrEqual, NegTable, NoOverlap, NotBetween, Precedence, Present, Require, Sorted, Start, StartAfter, SubSequence, Table
public interface ConstraintFromRecord extends Constraint, CacheScope
Utility class to automagically compute the scope of a record constraint. Only works with some basic types: - Expressions and derivatives - Collection<Expression> and derivatives - Collection<Collection<Expression>> and derivatives - Expression[] - Expression[][] Explodes when it discovers a type it doesn't know. You can @IgnoreScope custom types you want it to ignore.

  • Method Details

    • computeScope

      default Collection<? extends Expression> computeScope()
      Description copied from interface: CacheScope
      Computes the scope. Should be implemented by subclasses, but not used directly. Use scope() instead, which is cached.
      Specified by:
      computeScope in interface CacheScope
      Returns:
      the scope of the constraint, i.e. all the Expressions it uses. The collection should be immutable.
